seo.title: Phonetic Name Matching API | Superior KYC Verification | Decentro
seo.description: Evaluate the best KYC phonetic matching API competitors. Decentro's Farsight engine offers advanced phonetic algorithms for accurate identity verification and data reconciliation.
seo.ogTitle: Phonetic Name Matching API - Decentro Farsight

productBanner.heading: Intelligent testing Name Matching API
productBanner.subHeading: Combat spelling variations and transliteration errors for precise KYC verification. Ensure data integrity across diverse linguistic patterns.

inlineImageAndParagraph.heading: What is Phonetic Name Matching?
content: In the landscape of Fintech and KYC verification, exact string matching often fails due to spelling mistakes, typos, or transliteration variances (e.g., 'Rajiv' vs. 'Rajeev'). Phonetic Name Matching utilizes acoustic algorithms to analyze how a name sounds rather than just how it is spelled.

Decentro's solution acts as a robust fuzzy matching layer within our Data Forensics suite. Unlike standard KYC phonetic matching API competitors that may rely on generic global algorithms, our engine is fine-tuned for regional nuances, ensuring high-fidelity identity verification and reducing manual reconciliation efforts.

subBanner.heading: Farsight Data Forensics
subBanner.subHeading: Part of our comprehensive suite for fraud detection and identity validation.

textAndButtonBannerTransparent.heading: Solve the Transliteration Challenge
textAndButtonBannerTransparent.subHeading: Eliminate false negatives caused by data entry errors across different banking and government databases.

methodData.heading: How It Works
methodData.subHeading: From raw input to confidence scoring.

items.title: Input Injection
items.description: Submit two strings (Subject Name and Reference Name) via the `/v2/kyc/match` endpoint.

items.title: Algorithmic Processing
items.description: The engine applies advanced phonetic algorithms (like Soundex or Metaphone variants) optimized for vernacular pronunciations.

items.title: Score Generation
items.description: Receive a structured JSON response containing a match percentage and confidence score to automate your decision logic.

textAndButtonBannerTransparent2.heading: Reduce Drop-offs in Onboarding
textAndButtonBannerTransparent2.subHeading: Don't let a typo cost you a customer. Validate identities instantly.

data.heading: Neobanking & Wallets
content: Verify user identities during onboarding against bank records.
Match beneficiary names before initiating transfers.

data.heading: Lending & Insurance
content: Reconcile applicant names across credit bureau reports and ID documents.
Prevent fraud by detecting synthetic identity variations.

data.heading: Gig Economy & HR
content: Automate background checks by matching candidate details across databases.
Handle variations in regional names during bulk onboarding.

block1.heading: Advanced Phonetic Algorithms
block1.paragraph: Goes beyond Levenshtein distance to understand acoustic similarity in diverse dialects.

block1.heading: Transliteration Handling
block1.paragraph: Seamlessly matches names entered in English but derived from vernacular scripts.

block1extra.heading: Confidence Scoring
block1extra.paragraph: Returns a precise match score (0-100) allowing you to set custom thresholds for auto-approval.

items.title: Penny Drop Verification
items.description: Validate bank account holder names before payouts.

items.title: Database Deduplication
items.description: Cleanse your CRM by merging duplicate profiles with name variations.

items.title: AML Screening
items.description: Screen names against sanctions lists despite spelling differences.

textAndButtonBannerTransparent3.heading: Need Custom Logic?
textAndButtonBannerTransparent3.subHeading: We can tune our algorithms for specific regional datasets.

bulletPointsAndTextBlock.tagline: Why leading Fintechs choose Decentro over generic solutions.

bulletPoints.text: Superior handling of Indian names and honorary titles (e.g., Shri, Mr.).
Integrated ecosystem: Combine matching with OCR and CKYC in one flow.
Higher uptime and lower latency compared to legacy providers.
Flexible confidence thresholds tailored to your risk appetite.
Transparent documentation and dedicated developer support.
